## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT1G01070](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT1G01070)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>UMAMIT28</u>
- **Gene Name:** Usually multiple acids move in and out Transporters 28
- **Description:**   nodulin MtN21 /EamA-like transporter family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2200990
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [umamit28]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Significantly elevated levels of amino acids in the seeds. Reduced seed volume.
